short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The ultimate design tool for social media superstars.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Font Star is the ultimate multi-tool for finding, saving, and reusing emojis, and fancy text for YouTube descriptions, comments, and social media posting in general. Make your links to merch, subscriptions, and other calls to action stand out with icons and text that match your brand.

𝗔𝗱𝗱𝗶𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝗮𝗹 𝗙𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀
• Quickly access thousands of under utilized and built-in Unicode symbols and fonts.
• Adjust text output display of characters for easy click-and-paste into HTML, CSS, Python, and more.
• Auto-generate a recent list of all used characters so you’re never hunting for your favorite emoji.
• Click-and-paste fancy text and save your most used text for social media posts.
